A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film is stunningly beautiful and has an amazing soundtrack. It delivers twists and subverts expectations in some instances. 
But that's where the praise ends. 
The plot is flimsy and weak. There are too many forced\, unnecessary plot points and conflicts that were not needed. 
The characters have been disgraced. Luke Skywalker is a joke of what he used to be\, with his character apparently forgetting everything he did in the Original Trilogy. 
Leia is majorly underused and has no real significance to the story. 
The story does a disservice to everything the characters had went through beforehand.
